mapper.insert: INSERT INTO search_history (song_id, song_name, searched_at, user_id, image) VALUES (#{songId}, #{songName}, NOW(), #{userId}, #{image})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM search_history WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY searched_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sh.song_id, sh.user_id, sh.searched_at, s.song_name, s.image FROM search_history sh JOIN song s ON sh.song_id = s.song_id WHERE sh.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY sh.searched_at DESC
